history.proof: intros f a b pr_f pr. shelve.

ctx: intros f a b pr_f pr.
exceptions.tactic: pose (pr_neg := Riemann_integrable_opp f a b pr).
exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a, b : R pr_f : Riemann_integrable f a b pr : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => - f x) a b The term "pr" has type "Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => - f x) a b" while it is expected to have type "Riemann_integrable f a b" (cannot unify "{phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (- f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}}" and "{phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}}").

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr_f : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => - f x) a b), RiemannInt pr = - RiemannInt pr_f

Premises:
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
RiemannInt : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> R
RiemannInt_minus : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr_f : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr_g : Riemann_integrable g a b) (pr : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x - g x) a b), RiemannInt pr = RiemannInt pr_f - RiemannInt pr_g
RiemannInt_plus : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr_f : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr_g : Riemann_integrable g a b) (pr : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x + g x) a b), RiemannInt pr = RiemannInt pr_f + RiemannInt pr_g
RiemannInt_ext : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr_f : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr_g : Riemann_integrable g a b), (forall x : R, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> RiemannInt pr_f = RiemannInt pr_g
RiemannInt_P20 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (h : a <= b) (pr : forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> Riemann_integrable f a x) (pr0 : Riemann_integrable f a b), RiemannInt pr0 = primitive h pr b - primitive h pr a
FTC_Riemann : forall (f : C1_fun) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable (derive f (diff0 f)) a b), RiemannInt pr = f b - f a
RiemannInt_P13 : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b l : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable g a b) (pr3 : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b), RiemannInt pr3 = RiemannInt pr1 + l * RiemannInt pr2
RiemannInt_P12 : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b l : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable g a b) (pr3 : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b), a <= b -> RiemannInt pr3 = RiemannInt pr1 + l * RiemannInt pr2
RiemannInt_P33 : forall (f : C1_fun) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable (derive f (diff0 f)) a b), a <= b -> RiemannInt pr = f b - f a
RiemannInt_P8 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable f b a), RiemannInt pr1 = - RiemannInt pr2
RiemannInt_const : forall (c a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable (fun _ : R => c) a b), RiemannInt pr = c * (b - a)
RiemannInt_P9 : forall (f : R -> R) (a : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a a), RiemannInt pr = 0
RiemannInt_P18 : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable g a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x = g x) -> RiemannInt pr1 = RiemannInt pr2
RiemannInt_P17 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => Rabs (f x)) a b), a <= b -> Rabs (RiemannInt pr1) <= RiemannInt pr2
RiemannInt_P19 : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable g a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RiemannInt pr1 <= RiemannInt pr2
RiemannInt_P26 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b c : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable f b c) (pr3 : Riemann_integrable f a c), RiemannInt pr1 + RiemannInt pr2 = RiemannInt pr3
Riemann_integrable_opp : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => - f x) a b
Riemann_integrable_Ropp : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => - f x) a b
RiemannInt_P15 : forall (a b c : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable (fct_cte c) a b), RiemannInt pr = c * (b - a)
RiemannInt_P25 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b c : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable f b c) (pr3 : Riemann_integrable f a c), a <= b -> b <= c -> RiemannInt pr1 + RiemannInt pr2 = RiemannInt pr3
Riemann_integrable_minus : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable g a b -> Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x - g x) a b
RiemannInt_P5 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr1 pr2 : Riemann_integrable f a b), RiemannInt pr1 = RiemannInt pr2
RiemannInt_exists : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b) (un : nat -> posreal), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi_sequence un pr N)) l}
Riemann_integrable_scal : forall (f : R -> R) (a b k : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => k * f x) a b
Riemann_integrable_plus : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable g a b -> Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x + g x) a b
RiemannInt_const_bound : forall (f : R -> R) (a b l u : R) (h : Riemann_integrable f a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> l <= f x <= u) -> l * (b - a) <= RiemannInt h <= u * (b - a)
RiemannInt_P10 : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b l : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable g a b -> Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b
RiemannInt_P16 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => Rabs (f x)) a b
phi_sequence_prop : forall (un : nat -> posreal) (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b) (N : nat), {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi_sequence un pr N t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < un N}
RiemannInt_P1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable f b a
Riemann_integrable_ext : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable g a b
RiemannInt.Riemann_integrable_ext : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable g a b
StepFun_P28 : forall (a b l : R) (f g : StepFun a b), IsStepFun (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b
RiemannInt_P24 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b c : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable f b c -> Riemann_integrable f a c
RiemannInt_P4 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b l : R) (pr1 pr2 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (un vn : nat -> posreal), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> Un_cv (fun x : nat => vn x) 0 -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi_sequence un pr1 N)) l -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi_sequence vn pr2 N)) l
primitive : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> Riemann_integrable f a x) -> R -> R
FTC_P1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> Riemann_integrable f a x
RiemannInt_P22 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b c : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> a <= c <= b -> Riemann_integrable f a c
RiemannInt_P21 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b c : R), a <= b -> b <= c -> Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable f b c -> Riemann_integrable f a c
RiemannInt_P23 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b c : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> a <= c <= b -> Riemann_integrable f c b
Riemann_integrable_bound : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> exists s : R, forall x : R, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> f x <= s

```coq
intros f a b pr_f pr.
pose (pr_neg := Riemann_integrable_opp f a b pr).
rewrite (RiemannInt_minus f (fun x => - f x) a b pr_f pr_neg pr).
rewrite RiemannInt_const.
rewrite RiemannInt_const.
rewrite RiemannInt_const.
ring.
Qed.
```
